item.title: Dell considers Singapore to be one of the 50 economies worldwide that are prepared for the future
item.description: Dell recognized Singapore as one of 50 economies worldwide prepared to flourish in an evolving, globalized future through technological integration. The _Dell Future-Ready Economies Model*, the foundation for this ranking, assesses large, rapidly growing global metropolitan areas on characteristics that allow individuals and businesses to utilize innovative tools and concepts. These factors contribute to improved connectivity, superior economic performance, and a greater capacity to attract talent. The ranking evaluated the Global 50 cities based on three key aspects:
